tsdst.nn.model.NeuralNetwork¶

class tsdst.nn.model.NeuralNetwork(model, eval_size=10, batch_size=64, num_iterations=500, optimizer='adam', optimizer_args={'beta1': 0.9, 'beta2': 0.999, 'eps': 1e-08, 'learning_rate': 0.001}, m_scale=1, bn_tol=1e-09, bn_momentum=0, scorer='accuracy', shuffle=False, print_cost=True, random_state=42)[source]¶

The base class for custom neural networks in numpy

Methods
